  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_79644</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79644</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making bread</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden des Brotes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication du pain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo o pão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare pane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή του ψωμιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación del pan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations detailing the steps in preparing bread. A loaf bread is made by shaping the dough in a tin and allowing it to rise for the second time through the action of the yeast.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bread dough</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yeast</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, welche die Jobsteps 
genau schildern, wenn Brot vorbereitet wird. Ein Laibbrot wird 
gebildet, indem man den Teig in einem Zinn formt und ihn für das 
zweite mal durch die Tätigkeit der Hefe steigen läßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de trois illustrations détaillant les 
étapes en préparant le pain. Un pain de pain est fait en 
formant la pâte dans un bidon et en lui permettant de se lever pour 
la deuxième fois par l'action de la levure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três ilustrações que detalham as 
etapas em preparar o pão. Um pão do loaf é feito dando forma 
à massa de pão em uma lata e permitindo que levante-se para a 
segunda vez com a ação do fermento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che dettagliano i 
punti nella preparazione del pane. Un pane della pagnotta è 
fatto modellando la pasta in una latta e permettendo che aumenti per 
la seconda volta con l'azione del lievito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που απαριθμούν τα βήματα 
στην προετοιμασία του ψωμιού. Ένα ψωμί φραντζολών γίνεται 
με τη διαμόρφωση της ζύμης σε έναν κασσίτερο και στην άδεια σε 
της για να αυξηθεί για τη δεύτερη φορά μέσω της ενέργειας της 
ζύμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres ilustraciones que detallan los 
pasos de progresión en la preparación del pan. Un pan del pan 
es hecho formando la pasta en una lata y permitiendo que se levante 
para la segunda vez con la acción de la levadura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brotteig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikroorganismen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zinn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hefe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pâte de pain</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
